price: Basi tukamkamata yeye na majeshi yake na tukawatupa baharini, na yeye ndiye wa kulaumiwa.
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ
footnotes: Tukamchukua yeye na hao anao jitapia kwao, tukawatumbukiza baharini, naye ni mwenye kuyatenda hayo ya ukafiri na inda anayo laumiwa kwayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami wahuwa mulīmun
